name: Monster journal: a short story
description:
You got paid to go into a deep, dark cave, to get rid of the monsters there and save anyone that may still be alive.

Quickly get rid of the beasts, by slashing them into tiny pieces!
But they can pack a punch too! Use your shield and maange your stamina, to take as little damage as possible!

Controls
  • Attack - Left click / A
  • Block - (hold) Right click / D
  • Pause - Esc / P
Software used
  • Godot 3.3 Mono
  • VSCode
  • Aseprite
  • KenShape
  • Audacity

Made for the 48th Ludum Dare.
